thread.title: Lovely design/boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely design/boutique hotel - Review of MonHotel Lounge & Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SisselaN
title: Lovely design/boutique hotel
text:
We stayed here twice, always a very nice experience!
The hotel is located next to l´arc de triumph on the other side of the champs elysées.
Easy to walk there if one prefers that area.
The staff were not over-friendly but ok for french.
The rooms are gorgeous and it s very cute /stylish. We stayed at a small suite the second time on the corner overlooking the streets ( the quiet are -rue argentine mostly ) with a small french lovely balcony. Loved it - the bathroom and the room was put together just the bed side splitting them apart.
Can definitely recommend.
Room Tip: The suite in the corner with french balcony and overview over the always writing neighbor. ;=)) See more room tips
